data.name: UsageStatement
data.value:
Usage: ZptBuilder.exe [options] [inputs]
Selected options:
--help, -h Display this usage statement and exit
--html,-t Force HTML mode
--xml,-x Force XML mode
--no-xml-declaration Omit XML declaration when rendering XML
--input-filename-pattern=PATTERN,-p Search pattern for files to render when the input is a directory path
--output=LOCATION,-o Saves output to the specified path
--output-filename-extension=EXT,-E The extension for output file names
--ignore=PATH,-i Do not render files within this path
--output-encoding=ENCODING,-n Sets the output character encoding
Full documentation can be found in the manpage for ZptBuilder. For systems without 'man', a copy is provided in the file: ZptBuilder.MANUAL.txt
Up-to-date documentation and information is available at: http://csf-dev.github.io/ZPT-Sharp/
